channel.title: Pvp planet help please
channel.description:
okai if people call this a shitty source idc i like it but can somone please help me... iv went to the server.java client.java and changed ip's and ports but i still get this error when i click run.bat
'tskill' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Enforcing Devolution client requirement PVP Planet online by Jinrake Server is already in use. Server is already in use. Server is already in use. Server is already in use. Server is already in use. Server is already in use. Server is already in use. Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1 at ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:81) at ShopHandler.(ShopHandler.java:33) at server.main(server.java:136) Terminate batch job (Y/N)?

item.title: Pvp planet help please
item.dc:creator: @PvPXile PvPXile
item.description:
@PvPXile wrote:

Commands.java, ctrl+f, tskill, delete the command

Read full topic

item.title: Pvp planet help please
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException means that the array you’re trying to access is within an illegal index. Also, if I were you I’d remove tskill from my batch program, it’s useless all it does is end a process.

Read full topic

item.title: Pvp planet help please
item.dc:creator: @g0dp0wr g0dp0wr
item.description:
@g0dp0wr wrote:

also, are you running a auto restarter? tskill is an auto restarter type of prog.

how did you portforward? - if you can run other servers, and not this one it must be the source. try and re-edit the run.bat you are using. make it to where itll just run the server and not the extras.

the shophandler error is a different type of error, if you havent even started coding it yet, then the server has to be janky. im not dissing on the server you wanna use. but im saying id definitely find a similiar one and use it instead.

lemme know asap if youve ever logged into the server your trying to run, and or messed with the shop codes.

Read full topic

item.title: Pvp planet help please
item.dc:creator: @igotguts3 igotguts3
item.description:
@igotguts3 wrote:

hmmmm well i can run any other server on the same ports i closed everything ran this and it gives me this error.

and ima check the shop handler now.

Read full topic

item.title: Pvp planet help please
item.dc:creator: @g0dp0wr g0dp0wr
item.description:
@g0dp0wr wrote:

firstly, are you running anything else on the ports your setting it up as. like utorrent is still running? or anything like that… exactly how did u portfoward it?

also theres a run error in your shophandler, check your config files and make sure you didnt leave an extra space, or an empty space, or an added tab??

Read full topic
